subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Barry Almeida scored to give Boston College a three-goal third-period lead and the Eagles held off a late charge from Boston University to win, 4-3, and claim the 58th Beanpot championship Monday.
snippet: Barry Almeida scored to give Boston College a three-goal third-period lead and the Eagles held off a late charge from Boston University to win, 4-3, and claim the 58th Beanpot championship Monday.
